thread.title: Real Madrid look into ‘quitting La Liga to form European Super League’ after fall out over match postponement at Celta
thread.title_full: Real Madrid look into ‘quitting La Liga to form European Super League’ after fall out over match postponement at Celta

author: sstreet
title: Real Madrid look into ‘quitting La Liga to form European Super League’ after fall out over match postponement at Celta

organizations.name: celta efl real deal real madrid

text:
EFL Real Deal Real Madrid look into ‘quitting La Liga to form European Super League’ after fall out over match postponement at Celta 
Los Blancos' match was postponed over stadium damage this weekend and the club are so angry they may look at leaving La Liga altogether By SAM STREET
